text:
[Verse]
City lights are calling
Heart is racing wild
Through the streets we're running
Like untamed child's smile

[Verse 2]
Neon dreams are glowing
In the midnight air
Whispers softly flowing
Promises to dare

[Chorus]
Chasing neon dreams
In the electric night
Shining like a beam
In the city's light

[Verse 3]
Stars above are twinkling
Hope in every stride
Destiny is winking
As we laugh and glide

[Chorus]
Chasing neon dreams
In the electric night
Shining like a beam
In the city's light

[Bridge]
Through the crowds we wander
Feet on steady ground
Every step a wonder
In this vibrant sound
title: Chasing Neon Dreams
